name: hyperaesthetic
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
medical
  specialized experiencing feelings such as pain, heat, or cold in a way that is unusually strong and unpleasant: A hyperaesthetic overwhelming pain state can occur in patients with chronic pain. Patches or creams can be useful for patients who have small areas that are hyperaesthetic.
More examplesFewer examplesForeign bodies in the nose may give rise to symptoms that simulate hyperaesthetic rhinitis. The hyperaesthetic cat will react badly if it is pushed or pounced on during play with another cat.Hyperesthetic leukotrichia is a rare skin disease of horses.
